ModMetaData.name: Mechanical Defense 2 - mechanical walls
ModMetaData.author: mipen
ModMetaData.description:
"Mechanical Defense 2" (MD2)
- mechanical walls
>>Mechanical Walls - walls that be raised or lowered to allow access. (3 states: wall, embrasure, "walkable floor")
updated by sulusdacor ported to 1.0
Download links for Dropbox or Steamworkshop link can be found in the ludeon forum thread linked above.
